creator: sankar.narayanan80@gmail.com
text:
I am using appache velocity and fop 0.20.5 version

While generating pdf with FOP, the characters →, ↑ are not corrctly displayed in the PDF. It get printed as # instead of this  →, ↑.  

Can you please help, how to resolve this issue.

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text:
You need to open a bug request for Apache Velocity here:

https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/Dashboard.jspa

creator: sankar.narayanan80@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

Thanks for your advice. I have created bug in https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/Dashboard.jspa

FOP-2670
Unicode character (left arrow) is not displayed in PDF.It displayed as #


Thanks,
Sankaranarayanan
